body.name: Band-Aid Brand First Aid Products Tru-Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges for Cleaning and Cushioning Wounds, Low-Lint Design, 4 inches by 4 inches, Twin Pack, 2 x 50 Count

features: Twin pack with 2 boxes of 50-count each of Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Tru-Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges for cleaning and applying medication to wounds
These first aid supplies feature a special low-linting design which helps provide cleaner wounds and may help prevent irritation
Each large gauze sponge measures 4 inches by 4 inches in size, making them the ideal first aid coverings for minor cuts, scrapes, and burns
Sterile sponges feature soft cushioning offers extra comfort when cleaning dirt and contaminants from the injured area
Use these first aid gauze sponges for cleaning and prepping wounds, or for applying medication. They can also be used as absorbent wound dressing
body.description: Delicately care for wounds with Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Tru-Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges. Ideal for cleaning and applying medication to minor cuts, scrapes and burns. Their special low-linting design helps provide cleaner wounds and may help prevent irritation. Their pillow-soft cushioning offers extra comfort when cleaning dirt and contaminants from the injured area. Use these gauze sponges as first aid supplies, and for cleaning and prepping wounds, or for applying medication. Each sterile pad measures 4 by 4 inches. Each package contains 50 individually wrapped sterile gauze sponges.

Feature With KLING technology designed to stay in place even in hard to cover areas Feature Soft-foam backing moves with you Feature QUICK-LOC Technology with an anti-leak core to instantly absorb fluid Feature Stretches & secures to itself, providing freedom of movement Feature Stays in place for 8 hours Feature Extra thick and absorbent Feature Soft padding and instant absorption

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Elasticity and texture exactly what i was looking for Easy to apply and the weave is at the right consistency

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Band-Aid Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges: First Aid Essential for Clean and Versatile Wound Care
reviews.reviewText: The Band-Aid Brand Tru-Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges stand out as a reliable and versatile addition to any first aid arsenal. Measuring 4 inches by 4 inches, these pads are adept at cleaning and cushioning minor wounds, cuts, and burns. Individually wrapped for sterility, they ensure a hygienic application and reduce the risk of contamination, making them particularly convenient for on-the-go use.One of their commendable features is the low-lint design, which not only facilitates a clean application but also minimizes the potential for fibers sticking to wounds. This characteristic is crucial for promoting optimal wound healing. The soft and absorbent material effectively manages exudate while offering gentle cushioning, ensuring comfort during the healing process.The individually wrapped packaging enhances convenience, making these gauze sponges easily portable and readily available when needed. This is especially valuable for maintaining a hygienic first aid routine.In both everyday situations and more significant injuries, these gauze sponges consistently deliver reliable performance and cleanliness. Embodying the trusted quality associated with the Band-Aid Brand, the Tru-Absorb Sterile Gauze Sponges prove to be an indispensable and dependable component of a well-prepared first aid kit, ready to meet the demands of various wound care scenarios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good price and size. Works for covering large sores. I wish it wasn't packed with 2 gauze sponges in a pack because I only use one at a time. I keep the other gauze in the open packaging until I need to use it next time but it would be better to have them individually wrapped and kept sterile until needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I needed 3 hands!
reviews.reviewText: Works pretty good if you have 3 hands but I had a pretty large cut and made a wrinkled mess of the wrap. With help they work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024

reviews.reviewText: These are the best overall quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product to keep on hand!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product to have in your home first aid kit. We got these to refill ours after the ones that came with our kit ran out. They had great absorbancy! They also were softer than usual gauze and not as scratchy.
Great product! Shipping costs were very reasonable.
